Lyric:
A teacher works the whole day through / To teach important things to you
/ He'll teach you things you won't forget
/ Like numbers and the alphabet

Song: You've Got a Friend in Me
Artist: Rex Orange County and Randy Newman
Lyric: You've got troubles, I've got 'em too / There isn't anything I wouldn't do for you / We stick together and we see it through / You've got a friend in me

And I am finding out / 
There's just no other way / 
That I'm still dancing at the end of the day / 
If you leave the light on / 
Then I'll leave the light on

But I do know one and one is two / 
And if this one could be with you / 
What a wonderful world this would be

When the music plays we're right at home / 
And maybe sometimes we're still out of place / 
Lost in the space on my mind / 
But still the record place
We'll find a way

Song: Love You For A Long Time
Lyric:
And in the morning when I'm waking up / 
I swear that you're the first thing that I'm thinking of / I feel it in my body, know it in my mind / 
Oh I, I'm gonna love you for a long time

Lean on me, when you're not strong /
And I'll be your friend /
I'll help you carry on /
For it won't be long /
'Til I'm gonna need /
Somebody to lean on

Maybe, we can / 
Find a place to feel good / 
And we can treat people with kindness / 
Find a place to feel good

I'll reach out my hand to you / 
I'll have faith in all you do / 
Just call my name and I'll be there (I'll be there)

You can count on me like one two three / 
I'll be there 
And I know when I need it I can count on you like / four three two / 
You'll be there / 
'Cause that's what friends are supposed to do, oh yeah

You got to try a little kindness / 
Yes show a little kindness / 
Just shine your light for everyone to see / 
And if you try a little kindness / 
Then you'll overlook the blindness / 
Of narrow-minded people on the narrow-minded streets

Song: Thank you for Being a Friend
Lyric:
Thank you for being a friend / 
Traveled down a road and back again /
Your heart is true, you're a pal and a confidant

I know a place (ooh) / 
I know a place we can go (yeah) / 
Where everyone gonna lay down their weapon / 
Lay down their weapon /
Just give me trust and watch what'll happen

Song: With A Little Help From My Friends
Lyric:
Oh, I get by with a little help from my friends / 
Mm, I get high with a little help from my friends / 
Mm, gonna try with a little help from my friends

When the night has come / 
And the land is dark / 
And the moon is the only light we'll see /
No I won't be afraid / 
Oh, I won't be afraid / 
Just as long as you stand, stand by me

Don't overthink it /
Just finish up your drink /
And surround me, surround me

Winter, spring, summer or fall /
All you've got to do is call / 
And I'll be there, ye, ye, ye /
You've got a friend

One love / 
One heart / 
Let's get together and feel alright

And different strokes for different folks / 
And so on and so on and scooby dooby doo-bee /
Ooh, sha sha / 
We got to live together

Let's make the most of this beautiful day /
Since we're together, might as well say /
Would you be my, could you be my /
Won't you be my neighbor?
